name: Snake Party
description: Snake Party is the ultimate party game enabling up to six players to quickly arrange a snake race on the same computer! They can choose their own colors, type in their names and the game party is ready to go.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or above Processor: 1,2 Ghz or faster Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB video memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: optional
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: 1,5 Ghz or faster Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB video memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: onboard
